'''1.16.3''' is a minor update to {{JE}} released on September 10, 2020,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-java-edition-1-16-3|Minecraft Java Edition 1.16.3 Released|September 10, 2020}}</ref> which fixes two bugs.

The content of 1.16.3 is identical to its [[Java Edition 1.16.3 Release Candidate 1|release candidate]],<ref>{{tweet|adrian_ivl|1304065323369459713|We're now releasing 1.16.3. There are no changes from the release candidate. Enjoy your Thursday :)|September 10, 2020}}</ref> as the only difference between the two is a change in the [[data version|data]] and [[protocol version]]s.

== Fixes ==
{{Fixes|fixedin=1.16.3 Release Candidate 1
|;From 1.16.2
|196449|[[Piglin]]s, [[piglin brute]]s, [[hoglin]]s and [[zoglin]]s have trouble pathfinding to the [[player]] when attacking.
|198678|Giving an item and a [[gold ingot]] to a baby piglin and killing it duplicates the item.
}}</onlyinclude>
